name: GLOCK GAME
description:
So I, jafarJ , at TutorialsEU , turned Netflix Hit show SQUID GAME into an Online FPS using the magical powers of Unity 2021. Somehow in 5 days also. Now go and play right now so my suffering wasn´t for nothing.

Have fun playing, record yourself and comment the link under this video! Video

And let me know if anything is working! I do hope that it isn´t broken lol

Thanks!

Music by Karl Casey @ White Bat Audio
